
合约代码：
pragma solidity 0.4.18;

contract hello{
    string word="hello";
    
    function say () public pure returns(string) {
       return "hi";
    }
    
    function getValue() public view returns(string) {
       return word;
    }
    
    function addValue(uint number) public pure returns(uint) {
       return number+1;
    }
    
    function setValue(string _word) public  returns(string) {
       word=_word;
    }
}

web3deploy码
var helloContract = web3.eth.contract([{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"getValue","outputs":[{"name":"","type":"string"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"name":"number","type":"uint256"}],"name":"addValue","outputs":[{"name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"pure","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"name":"_word","type":"string"}],"name":"setValue","outputs":[{"name":"","type":"string"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"say","outputs":[{"name":"","type":"string"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"pure","type":"function"}]);
var hello = helloContract.new(
   {
     from: web3.eth.accounts[0], 
     data: '', 
     gas: '4700000'
   }, function (e, contract){
    console.log(e, contract);
    if (typeof contract.address !== 'undefined') {
         console.log('Contract mined! address: ' + contract.address + ' transactionHash: ' + contract.transactionHash);
    }
 })

Geth合约函数调用
1.无消耗函数的调用（不改变状态变量值）
(1)函数无入参
contract.function-name
例如：
hello.say()
hello.getWord()
（2）函数有入参
contract.function-name.call(函数参数)
例如：
hello.addValue(3)
hello.addValue.call(3)


2.有消耗函数的调用（会改写状态变量的值）
contract.function-name.sendTransaction(参数, {from: 用户账户的address})
例如：
hello.setValue.sendTransaction("hallo",{from :eth.accounts[0]})
 contractstring.setValue.sendTransaction("aaabbb",{from:eth.accounts[0]})


交易：涉及到区块链值得写入（部署合约、转账、状态变量赋值及修改值），都是属于交易，有消耗，需要挖矿
